attributes.action: make J.K Rowling a Dame Commander of the British Empire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are calling on the Prime Minister to advise the Queen to make the truly deserving, Joanne Rowling, Dame Commander of the British Empire. J.K Rowling has changed the reading habits of modern youth, and her stories have captured the hearts of so many, both young and old. For this, and endless other reasons including her fantastic charity work, it is clear this honour is long overdue. We hope you agree she is a deserving recipient for the near future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
